content:
I don’t know your favorite food yet.

## Quick ask
- Tell me your favorite food (and any specific dish or style).
- Should I remember it for next time? (Yes/No)

## Examples you can send
- “Sushi — especially salmon nigiri.”
- “Neapolitan pizza with pepperoni.”
- “Spicy chicken tacos with salsa verde.”
- “Ramen — tonkotsu broth.”

## Optional details
- Any must-have toppings or go-to restaurants?
- Any dietary preferences or no-go ingredients?

Share it now and I’ll remember it for future chats.
